title: Nintendo makes rare apology over ‘Pokémon Scarlet,’ ‘Violet’ quality
description: Nintendo acknowledged complaints around performance issues in “Pokémon Scarlet" and “Violet,” promising improvements.

title: The NFL hopes video games can get young people into sports again
description: The NFL wants to reach new fans through the metaverse. "Fortnite's" new NFL Zone, a football-themed hub, is one such effort.

title: Elon Musk wants to put chips in human brains. That could take awhile.
description: Elon Musk says Neuralink's brain chip is about six months from human trials

title: Female truckers group alleges Facebook’s ad system is discriminatory
description: Real Women in Trucking alleges in the new complaint that Meta is steering ads for lucrative jobs away from women and older workers.

title: From quitting to blocking: How to protect yourself on Musk’s Twitter
description: From locking down privacy settings to finding a new social network, Twitter regulars have many options for protecting their personal information.

title: Meta’s new AI is skilled at a ruthless, power-seeking game
description: The model is adept at forethought, negotiation and trickery. One expert called it "super scary."
